Name: Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush - Dual Color
Description:
Say goodbye to tangled hair with the **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**.

Transform your daily hair routine with this innovative brush, bringing you closer to a smoother, more enjoyable combing experience. Featuring super-elastic bristles in five lengths, this tool swiftly and gently detangles your hair, minimizing breakage and preserving its structure. Feel the soothing scalp massage as the bristles stimulate blood circulation, leaving your hair softer and revitalized. Suitable for all hair types, the **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush** effortlessly tames both wet and dry hair, thanks to its ergonomic handle that ensures optimal comfort.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**:
‚≠ê Hold the hairbrush firmly and gently brush through your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to the roots.
‚≠ê Clean the hairbrush regularly with warm water and mild shampoo.
‚≠ê Gently remove any hair or product buildup.
‚≠ê Allow the brush to air dry completely before using it again.
‚≠ê Store the hairbrush in a clean, dry place to maintain its quality.

üîπ Ingredients of **Killys Magic Brush Hairbrush**:
‚≠ê Acrylonitrile butadiene styrene
‚≠ê Thermoplastic elastomer

Name: KillyS Detangling Comb - Transparent Pink with Handle
Description:
Discover effortless hair styling with the **KillyS Detangling Comb**, meticulously designed to provide a tangle-free combing experience. The **KillyS** comb features a comfortable, profiled handle specifically engineered for a firm grip during use, making it an essential tool for all hair types. It's lightweight and durable, making it the perfect travel companion that you can slip into your bag without worrying about space or sturdiness.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **KillyS Detangling Comb**:
‚≠ê Hold the comb firmly in your hands.
‚≠ê Gently run it through your hair, starting from the ends and working your way up to detangle knots.
‚≠ê To avoid split ends from towel-drying and rubbing, gently squeeze excess water out with your hands and wrap your hair in a cotton t-shirt to absorb water quickly.
‚≠ê Clean the comb regularly with warm water and mild shampoo.
‚≠ê Gently remove any trapped hair or product buildup.
‚≠ê Store in a dry place away from direct sunlight to maintain its quality.

üîπ Ingredients of **KillyS Detangling Comb**:
‚≠ê POLISTYRENE

Name: KillyS Nail File 180/240 Straight Floral Design Pink
Description:
Experience elegance and effectiveness with the **KillyS Nail File 180/240 Straight Floralove Pink**. This classic nail file, featuring 180/240 grit, is designed to provide a perfect experience for shortening, shaping, and smoothing the edges of your natural nails. ‚≠ê Choose the appropriate grit or coarseness based on your nail type and needs.

Name: KillyS Precision Curved Cuticle Scissors
Description:
Experience precision and professionalism with **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors. Crafted from high-quality stainless steel with a sleek glossy-matt finish, these scissors are specifically designed to make cuticle removal effortless. The sharp, curved blades offer superior accuracy, while the comfortable handles ensure ease of use, perfect for both professional salon settings and home manicures. **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors are autoclave sterilizable, guaranteeing the highest hygiene standards.

üîπ Usage Instructions for **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors:
‚≠ê Soften cuticles by soaking hands in warm, soapy water.
‚≠ê Gently push back cuticles with a cuticle pusher.
‚≠ê Hold scissors at a slight angle, ensuring curved blades face away from nail bed.
‚≠ê Carefully trim excess cuticles or hangnails with small, precise cuts.
‚≠ê Avoid cutting too close to the nail bed.
‚≠ê Use a smooth, controlled motion, working one small section at a time.
‚≠ê After trimming, moisturize cuticles with oil or lotion.

üîπ Ingredients of **KillyS** Cuticle Scissors:
‚≠ê STAINLESS STEEL.
